lead_paragraph: This is the ninth number of the NEWYORK DAILY TIMES, and it has now a regular paying circulation of over TEN THOUSAND COPIES. If any other newspaper ever started in this City or in any other part of the world, ever reached so large a circulation in so short a time, we should be very glad to be informed of the fact.
